actions.name: Shields Down
actions.description: Effect: While the user meets the [Intrepid 1/2] Condition, the user is in Meteor Forme, otherwise they are in Core Forme, changing Formes as a Free Action. While in Meteor Forme, the user is unaffected by [Major Affliction]s and [Minor Affliction]s. While in Core Forme, the user is unaffected by negative [Stage Change] effects.
